DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacious dose range use bowel preparation colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Bowel Preparation Before Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Men nonpregnant woman schedule elective colonoscopy least 50 year age . Are able communicate study personnel comply study requirement . Are able willing follow studyspecified testing , diet , hydration regimen . Have inform nature risk study give write informed consent . Have know suspect liver disease history abnormal liver function test . Have clinically active cardiovascular disease within past 6 month . Have blood pressure great 150/90 mm Hg . Have know suspected renal insufficiency . Have know suspect electrolyte abnormality , gastrointestinal obstruction , gastric retention , bowel perforation , toxic colitis , toxic megacolon , ileus . Have history prior bowel surgery within 2 year enrollment , active inflammatory bowel disease . Have diabetes history diabetes . Have clinical evidence dehydration . Are pregnant breastfeeding . Are unwilling abstain alcohol consumption one day colonoscopy discharge study . Use prohibit medication study define timeframes . Have receive investigational agent within 30 day dose . Have know contraindication study treatment . Have know suspected allergy component study medication . Have condition would make subject unsuitable inclusion study .
